question: guardians of the galaxy blue guy in prison
vanilla_rag_result: The "blue guy" in prison from the "Guardians of the Galaxy" series is likely referring to Nagan, who is mentioned as one of the inmates left behind in the Negative Zone's Prison 42. He is involved in a fight with Star-Lord, who is trying to stop Blastaar and his horde from invading Earth via the closed portal in the prison.
